FuncDef: This command configures the uplink association to be used for the associated satellite port.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the satellite physical port ID. This must use the format slot/mda/port. All satellites have a single slot and a single MDA, so these values will always be 1. For example, port 10 would be specified as 1/1/10.
Specifies that the uplink association is returned to the system default.
